rows: Click an element within the Shadow DOM component.
Returns theshadow rootof the Angular component by the CSS selector. Use the shadow root to select other elements.
Returns the instance of the element within Shadow DOM by the CSS selector. Use thewaitForVisibleparameter to specify whether to wait for the instance to become visible.
Returns the instances of elements within Shadow DOM by the CSS selector.
Hover over the element within Shadow DOM.
Waits until the element within the Shadow DOM component becomes visible and returns its instance.

Waits until the element within the Shadow DOM component becomes hidden.
tables.html:
Method

Description

clickShadowItem()

Click an element within the Shadow DOM component.

getShadowRootElement()

Returns the shadow root of the Angular component by the CSS selector. Use the shadow root to select other elements.

getShadowWebElement()

Returns the instance of the element within Shadow DOM by the CSS selector. Use the waitForVisible parameter to specify whether to wait for the instance to become visible.

getShadowWebElements()

Returns the instances of elements within Shadow DOM by the CSS selector.

mouseOverShadowItem()

Hover over the element within Shadow DOM.

waitForShadowItem()

Waits until the element within the Shadow DOM component becomes visible and returns its instance.

waitForShadowItemExist()

Waits until the element within the Shadow DOM component becomes visible.

waitForShadowItemHide()

Waits until the element within the Shadow DOM component becomes hidden.
